analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xee8d31fb0c278de147e621c6cee5905c1a5d4323.sol:
	Contract YBCLiveToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xee8d31fb0c278de147e621c6cee5905c1a5d4323.sol#353-354)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0xee8d31fb0c278de147e621c6cee5905c1a5d4323.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0xee8d31fb0c278de147e621c6cee5905c1a5d4323.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0xee8d31fb0c278de147e621c6cee5905c1a5d4323.sol#146) is not in mixedCase
